tool_description: Scans form elements for accessibility compliance including labels, fieldsets, error handling, and keyboard navigation.

html_content.description: HTML content containing forms to scan

check_labels.description: Whether to validate form control labels

check_fieldsets.description: Whether to validate fieldset usage for grouped controls

check_error_handling.description: Whether to check for accessible error messaging

check_required_indicators.description: Whether to validate required field indicators

validate_input_types.description: Whether to validate appropriate input types

error_messages: Invalid HTML content: Provide valid HTML content containing form elements.
No forms found: The HTML content contains no form elements to analyze.
usage: Provide HTML content to scan all form elements for accessibility compliance. Enable specific checks for labels, fieldsets, error handling, and input validation.

unlabeled_controls.description: Number of controls without proper labels

missing_fieldsets.description: Number of control groups missing fieldsets
